about_the_game:
On a street so lonely, in a town so quiet, stands a mall no more, but a place for the old and unwanted, in plain sight to all, but very few enthralled.

Yet in this dimness, a strange sight does appear, the building's windows aglow, as if to cheer, amidst the darkness, they shine so clear, a beacon of hope, dispelling fear.

When night is broken, the end is awoken, but until then, don't run too fast, don't be too rash, Or your demise might arise. That, I am certain.

Horror Cartridge Collection is a series of short form horror games in the PSX style, with each game (Cartridge) offering a unique experience with different gameplay mechanics, styles and stories all connected by the mall.

Key Features

  • Explore the mall

  • In-game achievements

  • Collectables

  • Multiple endings

  • Adjustable retro settings

  • Developer Commentary

  • Cheats

The Found Cartridges

Out Of Gas

Your car has just run out of gas in the middle of nowhere. A sign tells you a gas station is only two miles up the road. Make your way to it on foot.

  • Playtime - 10 Minutes | Endings - 7 | Collectables - 1

  • First-person - Walking - Dialogue

Nightmare

You are a young child who has woken up in the middle of the night after hearing a sound coming from downstairs. Investigate the sound and remember, don't panic.

  • Playtime - 12 Minutes | Endings - 2 | Collectables - 1

  • First-person - Cartoony - Lucid - Monsters

The Mine

The sun has set, it's time to descend into the mine in search of riches. Take your trusty pickaxe and lantern in the exploration for ore and other treasures.

  • Playtime - 38 Minutes | Endings - 4 | Collectables - 2

  • First-person - Mining - Combat - Zombies

Warehouse 14

It's 2am and you have just scaled the wall to get into a warehouse park. A friend told you one of the warehouses is storing something valuable, find warehouse 14, break in and steal what's inside.

  • Playtime - 9 Minutes | Endings - 1 | Collectables - 1

  • First-person - Walking

M.A.D

It's the height of the Cold War and the launch order has just been sent. Take control of your launch control center and perform your duty to your country.

  • Playtime - 3 Minutes | Endings - 3 | Collectables - 1

  • First-person - Typing - Nuclear war - Time limit

Santa's Workshop

It's Christmas eve and all the toys have been assembled, but now they need to be packaged and put into Santa's bag for delivery. You are a freshly hired elf tasked with taking the assembled toys and packaging them ready for children to open on Christmas day, work fast, midnight is approaching.

  • Playtime - 5 Minutes | Endings - 3

  • First-person - Sorting - Packaging - Time limit

Eternal Storage

You have just purchased an abandoned storage unit and have arrived at the facility to clear it out, find the unit and start clearing out all the junk, keep your eye out for anything that looks valuable, you never know what you might find.

  • Playtime - 52 Minutes | Endings - 2 | Collectables - 1

  • First-person - Unpacking - Dialogue

Resolve Your Fate

A mysterious book has been left at the door, but beware the power that's held inside. Can you overcome the curse and free yourself? Or will you succumb and meet your fate.

  • Playtime - 70 Minutes | Endings - 9

  • Choices Matter - Text based

Notice about translations

Translations from English to other languages has been done by automated service, as such translations may contain errors and are not 100% accurate.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of Violence, Gore, Body horror, Death, Swearing, Nuclear war, suicide, torture.
Future content may depict self harm, disturbing content, implied sexual acts.
Each game has a content warning and can be skipped.

name: Horror Cartridge Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A collection of retro styled games bundled together, experience many forms of horror in a wide array of styles whilst uncovering the mysteries of the old mall that holds them all.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support
